resources.string: Close the application
Return to the previous screen
Should I work out today?
Click to continue
Navigation Heptagon
No option available
Yes, I feel great!
No, not at all
I guess, but…
Do you feel good today?
Buuuuuuuuut?
Click on an emoji to see the description
Well it sucks that you feel like that, if I\'m honest
So, what\'s up?
I don\'t feel well
To be honest, I\'m hungover
Bad day, very angry
My anxiety is really high today, I can\'t handle the other people
I\m in pain!
I\'m really tired
My depression is bad today. I don\'t even want to get out of bed
What kind of unwell are we talking?
Definitely rehydrate then. Sounds like you would benefit from getting some of those toxins out of your system!
Do you know what\'s great for that?
Trust me, everyone in the gym is worried about themselves. You can do this!
Are you sore, or injured?
Do you need to be at the gym to exercise?
Did you get at least 6 hours sleep last night?
I know it\'s hard, but the endorphins will help. Even if you just do the bare minimum, you\'ll feel better
Can\'t get to the gym today
It\'s my rest day, dammit!
It is raining though
I don\'t have a lot of time today
Oh, really…?
Well, if you say so
Sniffles, sore throat (no mucus), but nothing in the chest
Chest cold, stomach bug or producing mucus
I have a headache
It\'s understandable not wanting to spread that
Just sore
Genuinely injured!
That does not sound good, make sure you seek medical advice if needed
Are you sure about that?
Really, REALLY sure?
Yes, I\'m sure
No, I guess I could make some time
Yes, I\'m busy all day and won\'t even have time to browse on my phone!
No, I guess not
Assuming clearance from your doctor, can you exercise a different body part?
I suppose I can, yes
Doctor has said no!
No, I\'m paralysed from the neck down and in hospital as we speak!
Listen to your doctor!
Can you access the internet?
Yes, I have internet access
No, I\'m Amish and/or didn\'t pay my bill
Yes, I really do
No, I suppose I do have alternatives
Yes, I did indeed
Honestly, no. I put Netflix on last night and one thing led to another…
Good job YouTube has plenty of at home workouts!
Can you go for a run outside?
Yes, I forgot I have legs!
No, there is a black hole outside my door and I\'m trapped
I think you know what I am going to say…
A black hole!? Dayum…
Do you hear the words coming out of your mouth?
Fine, fine. Don\'t exercise then
Exercise! What are you waiting for!?
As you feel so good, there\'s no reason not to work out, time to get sweaty!
If your symptoms are not severe and you generally feel OK, then you can exercise. \nHowever, it is important not to exercise if you have a fever. A fever is when your body\'s temperature is >= 38C
I know it\â€™s hard. I also know you can do this. I believe in you!"
You might feel that exercise is the last thing on your mind. But, in fact, regular exercise will make you feel less tired in the long run, so you\'ll have more energy.
But be careful, if you feel any pain when exercising make sure you stop immediately, and consult medical advice
Research shows that physical activity can also boost self-esteem, mood, sleep quality and energy, as well as reducing your risk of stress, depression, dementia and Alzheimer\'s disease.
Start each run with a gentle warm-up of at least 5 minutes. This can include quick walking, marching on the spot, knee lifts, side stepping and climbing stairs
I will recommend some bodyweight workouts you can do. If none of these are suitable Youtube is your best friend!
For trying to use such a silly excuse, I suggest you add 25 burpees to your workout as punishment!\n(No obligation, but a kitten will cry if you don\'t)
Even if you only spend 30 minutes working out, it will be worth it
Rest up, drink plenty of fluids and I hope you feel better soon. Thank you for not spreading your lurgy to the rest of us!
Take today as a rest day, avoid caffeine and try to get an early night. Tomorrow is another day!
If you\'re doctor has ordered you to rest, why on earth are you using this app!? Don\'t be foolish, make sure you recover
It is extremely impressive that you\'re able to use this app in your current condition. Almost makes it unbelievable…
Rest days are important, and you\'ve earned this! Enjoy your day off, and we\'ll see you back in the gym tomorrow!
We all have days where we are too busy, but often we can find time if we practice some time management skills. Use today as a learning experience.
